p: The presence of PUFAs guarantees membrane fluidity and plasticity, providing a more dynamic environment due to the high number of double bonds, even if in a different extent between n-3 and n-6 fatty acids [ 10]. As a consequence, not only the presence of PUFAs, but also the balance between n-3 and n-6 PUFAs influences different processes on membranes, such as trafficking and vesicle budding and fusion [ 28].
